statements: SELECT * FROM MicrobiomeData;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name FROM MicrobiomeData ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM MicrobiomeData;
SELECT bacteria_name, bacteria_count FROM MicrobiomeData WHERE bacteria_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM MicrobiomeData WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM MicrobiomeData WHERE bacteria_count > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC
SELECT bacteria_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM MicrobiomeData GROUP BY bacteria_name HAVING total_count > 5
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM MicrobiomeData WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, collection_date FROM MicrobiomeData WHERE bacteria_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY sample_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, AVG(bacteria_count) as avg_count FROM MicrobiomeData GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(bacteria_count) > 50
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data ORDER BY abundance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE sample_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, health_status FROM gut_health_data WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT sample_id, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_data GROUP BY sample_id HAVING total_abundance > 100;
SELECT id, sample_id, bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY bacteria_name DESC, abundance ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, health_status FROM gut_health_data WHERE health_status = 'Healthy' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT sample_id, health_status FROM microbiome_data JOIN gut_health_data ON microbiome_data.sample_id = gut_health_data.sample_id WHERE abundance < 0.3 AND health_status = 'Unhealthy';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_samples FROM microbiome_data;
SELECT MAX(abundance) AS max_abundance FROM microbiome_data;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT subject_id, age, gender, health_condition FROM research_subjects ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT result_id, sample_id, subject_id, analysis_date, analysis_type, result_value FROM analysis_results WHERE result_value < 0.05;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples JOIN analysis_results ON microbiome_samples.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT subject_id, age, gender, health_condition FROM research_subjects WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M';
SELECT rs.subject_id, rs.health_condition, ar.analysis_date, ar.analysis_type FROM research_subjects rs JOIN analysis_results ar ON rs.subject_id = ar.subject_id;

SELECT ms.sample_id, ms.species_name, ar.analysis_type, ar.result_value FROM microbiome_samples ms JOIN analysis_results ar ON ms.sample_id = ar.sample_id WHERE ar.result_value > 0.8 ORDER BY ms.sample_id ASC, ar.result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_date, microbial_species FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat, phylum FROM microbial_species_info WHERE class = 'Mammalia';
SELECT analysis_id, sample_id, analysis_date, analysis_type FROM sample_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'PCR' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT sample_id, microbial_species, abundance FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance < 0.2 AND sample_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, ethnicity FROM patient_data INNER JOIN microbiome_samples ON patient_data.patient_id = microbiome_samples.patient_id WHERE abundance > 0.5
SELECT sample_id, analysis_type, result FROM sample_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC

SELECT sample_id, microbial_species, abundance, analysis_type, result FROM microbiome_samples INNER JOIN sample_analysis ON microbiome_samples.sample_id = sample_analysis.sample_id WHERE result = 'positive'
SELECT * FROM samples;
SELECT sample_name, bacteria_count FROM samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'ABC University';
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY collection_date DESC, sample_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sample_name, collection_date FROM samples WHERE bacteria_count > 1000 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients JOIN samples ON patients.patient_id = samples.patient_id WHERE samples.bacteria_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies JOIN researchers ON studies.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bacteria WHERE bacteria_genus = 'Staphylococcus' OR bacteria_species = 'E.coli';
